Posts.Content: I read pathology report.  Usual hyperplasia and other things I will look up. Benign doest mean all clear it seems. Clear now. Usual hyperplasia is a precursor for csncer I looked up. Anyone here have or had this? They want to see me in 6 months. I want to know now what's going on. Dense breast and can't see. Any advice?
Posts.Title: Usual hyperplasia on path report.

Posts.Content: I am terrified and bracing myself. Yesterday went for diagnostic mama ND ultrasound. Dr came in and I knew that was not good. I feel like aI have been punched in the stomach. I don't know what to do but am making apps for biopsy. I am freaking out
Posts.Title: Hello... Looking for someone to talk to
